fields.name: Introduction
fields.description: Just shows the word and an icon to click the speaker.

fields.name: Sight Match
fields.description: Show the word above and they have to click the word in a group below. First click either pass or fail.

fields.name: Cross Match
fields.description: Two lists of words, click one, then click the other. If wrong, both get crossed out red.

fields.name: Spell Match
fields.description: Word displayed above, need to spell, have a done button.

fields.name: Sight Search
fields.description: Basic word search. Student clicks letters, circling in row. When circle matches, word is crossed out. Done button.

fields.name: Sound Match
fields.description: Button to play sound, pick from a list.
